description: (i) Change of use from offices (Class B1) to residential at Basement, Ground and 1st-6th floor levels (8,621sq.m). (ii) External alterations to the building including the installation of new metal framed windows and refurbishment of the exterior. (iii) A part one and part two storey extension at roof level (807sq.m). The development would provide 90 dwellings.
